security: The document is unclassified and has been released with deletions, so there's no specific content to quote that would be unwise to share.
summary: This is an exhibit cover sheet for a letter written by Cecil L. Griggs, the adopted father of Kenneth C. Griggs, to Philip LaChapelle, concerning Kenneth Griggs' background.
summary_one_paragraph: This document is an exhibit cover sheet from INSCOM/CSF, dated January 24, 1968, pertaining to Kenneth C. Griggs. It describes a copy of a letter written on November 16, 1967, by Cecil L. Griggs, Kenneth's adopted father, to Philip LaChapelle. The letter is indexed separately and concerns Kenneth C. Griggs, PFC, his date and place of birth (December 25, 1946, Korea), and is part of file number 8008-9182 within the 115th MI Group (IV).
title: EXHIBIT COVER SHEET
